question: Trivendra Singh Rawat, who resigned recently, was the Chief Minister of which state?
explanation:
Uttarakhand Chief Minister Trivendra Singh Rawat resigned recently. The 60-year-old leader tendered his resignation to Governor Baby Rani Maurya.
With only a year short of the state elections, the BJP legislature party in Uttarakhand is to meet shortly to choose a new leader. Trivendra Singh Rawat sworn in as the Chief Minister in the year 2017.
